title: It is a Spanish river which has its source in the Montes Universales in the mountain ranges of the north westernmost end of the Sistema Ibérico. It discharges into the Medterranean sea near the city of Valencia. Which river is it?

This food is very typical in Spain, but it was born in Valencia. It is a rice-based meal, that appears yellow once completely done.
